Package solver.reachablepoints.singlethreaded

Class ReachablePointsSingleThreaded

  • java.lang.Object
    • solver.reachablepoints.singlethreaded.ReachablePointsSingleThreaded
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReachablePoints
    public class ReachablePointsSingleThreaded
extends Object
implements IReachablePoints
    Class implementing the IReachablePoints interface. The reachable points calculation is performed on a single thread (main thread). The calculation is distributed to multiple GradualReachablePointsCalculation objects which are repeatedly alternated to distribute the resources equally.

        probabilities - FloatMatrix containing the enemy probability values

        Parameters:

        board - Board to check for collisions
        probabilities - probabilities of enemies as FloatMatrix
        minSteps - minimum steps of enemies as FloatMatrix

      • executeCalculationLoop

        private void executeCalculationLoop​(utility.game.step.IDeadline deadline)
        Executes the main calculation loop. Thereby multiple calculations are repeatedly alternated until a IDeadline is reached.
        Parameters:
        deadline - IDeadline for the calculations

      • updateActionsRatings

        Updates the success and cut off ratings with the calculated success and cut off matrices.
